backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two hero‑section UI updates to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all main frontend components, sections, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables, theme tokens, and dark‑mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata, Open Graph tags, and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout stitching together navbar, all marketing sections, and the footer.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form with validation, submission simulation, success state, and controlled inputs.
Footer containing brand info, quick links, services list, contact details, and social icons.
Responsive navbar with scroll detection, smooth section navigation, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an About section with a profile image, practice description, and a list of qualifications.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact details, confidentiality notice, and a contact form layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Provides a hero banner with background image, intro text, and buttons that scroll to other sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Highlig: Shows key highlights of the practice using icons and brief descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists major service categories with icons and descriptions in a card grid.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity, refetching queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context for authentication, identity loading, and login state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder indicating no backend queries are required for the marketing site.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines an extensive OKLCH-based light and dark theme with CSS variables for colors, radius, and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, extended styles, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores the project's state, constraints, design requirements, and feature definitions for building a professional chartered accountant website.
